uk.knightz.knightzapi.communication.server

Interface Server

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleServer

    public interface Server
    Represents an external server, running the KnightzAPI Web API.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Future<org.apache.http.HttpResponse> callModule(Module m)
      Execute a module on this server.
      Future<org.apache.http.HttpResponse> callModule(Module m, String data)
      Execute a module on this server.
      Future<org.apache.http.HttpResponse> callModule(String requestID)
      Searches for a module with the given request ID on this server, if it is present execute it.
      InetSocketAddress getAddress()
      Get the IP address of this server.
      String getPubKey()
      Get the public RSA used for this Server to encrypt data.
      Future<org.apache.http.HttpResponse> sendData(String data)
      Send data to this server.
      Future<org.apache.http.HttpResponse> sendData(String reqID, String data) 

    • Method Detail

      • getAddress

        InetSocketAddress getAddress()
        Get the IP address of this server.
        Returns:
        The IP address of this server Will possibly return null in future updates if server aliases are added

      • sendData

        Future<org.apache.http.HttpResponse> sendData(String data)
        Send data to this server. It will be automatically encrypted, and any necessary authorisation will also be done
        Parameters:
        data - The data to send
        Returns:
        A Future of the HttpResponse that the server returned

      • callModule

        Future<org.apache.http.HttpResponse> callModule(Module m)
        Execute a module on this server. If the server does not have the module installed, one of two things will occur NOT YET IMPLEMENTED 1) If the server has auto-download set in their config the module will be downloaded and run (potentially dangerous!). 2) Otherwise, nothing
        Parameters:
        m - The module to call
        Returns:
        The server's HTTP Response after sending the request
        See Also:
        Module.forName(String)

      • callModule

        Future<org.apache.http.HttpResponse> callModule(Module m,
                                                String data)
        Execute a module on this server.
        Parameters:
        m - The module to call
        data - Any other data to provide
        Returns:
        A Future of the HttpResponse that the server returned

      • sendData

        Future<org.apache.http.HttpResponse> sendData(String reqID,
                                              String data)

      • callModule

        Future<org.apache.http.HttpResponse> callModule(String requestID)
        Searches for a module with the given request ID on this server, if it is present execute it.
        Parameters:
        requestID - The module request ID to search for, and if present, execute.
        Returns:
        The server's HTTP Response after sending the request
        See Also:
        callModule(Module)

      • getPubKey

        String getPubKey()
        Get the public RSA used for this Server to encrypt data.
        Returns:
        The public key in plain text format
